website_summaries.verdict: The buttery taste and hint of Himalayan salt makes this ghee a crowd pleaser.
pros: The grass-fed cows that source this ghee come from New Zealand and eat the finest grass
This ghee remains spreadable at room temperature and goes great on toast and roasted veggies
cons: Few have complained that the ghee arrives as liquid upon shipment

customer_reviews.title: GROSS!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the worst Ghee butter I have ever had. Way too strong and greasy! I Use it in my coffee normally, I tried to cook with it and it was still way to strong for me. No I would not recommend this butter. The HORRIBLE smell and taste LINGERS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Elena

customer_reviews.title: I love Ghee in my coffee
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to have as my butter for starting my Keto way of eating. Honestly, I have never been a butter lover my entire life so I was really not looking forward to the idea of butter in coffee, or using butter so lavishly in receipes. After reading about all the different butters, I thought i would try Ghee. I must have read all the reviews for 4th & Heart & the positives won me over. Now after 2 weeks use, I love Ghee in my coffee, & cooking with it is easy. Found my keeper.
customer_reviews.author: shoppin4bargains

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this a week before and they were great, but these towo came and the contents was ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a week before and they were great, but these towo came and the contents was not the same consistency of the previous order. It was all separated and and runny, It was very disappointing. I did get a refund, because it looked totally inedible. The video shows the one on the left is the one that came kind of messed up and the one on the right is the product of the same brand that had a normal consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Torchia

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: This is a good flavored and well-made ghee. I especially like their commitment to sustainable values, 100% grass-fed and responsibly sourced butter. However, as someone who uses ghee daily for cooking, dietary and coffee purposes, the consistency and flavor isn't as deep and rich as other grass-fed brands nor even Indian store brands like Nanak or Swad. In that sense, it is very similar to organic valley's ghee butter. I liked this ghee and will come back to it from time to time but will be using another brand for my go-to needs.
customer_reviews.author: VV

customer_reviews.title: I Adore 4th & Heart
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is absolutely delicious and hands down my favorite brand above all others! The taste of the himalayan pink salt in this is subtle and adds the appropriate amount of flavor without being overpowering. I love this flavor and the Madagascar Vanilla Bean the most! At this point I pretty much consider both to be "must have's" in my pantry! I love the fact that it's available on Autoship as well saving that extra 15% really helps! Give it a try..... you'll probably REALLY like it!
customer_reviews.author: WLB R.N.

customer_reviews.title: The first jar I got was WONDERFUL! It was soft like butter and had a ...
customer_reviews.text: The first jar I got was WONDERFUL! It was soft like butter and had a wonderful garlic fragrance. The last two I have received were hard and the evidence of garlic was almost absent. I notice the label is slightly different than the first one, and I wonder if the company changed its recipe. Whatever the reason for the change, if they get back to where they were, I'd be very interested in resuming the purchase of this product. PLEASE change it back.
customer_reviews.author: The Ys guys

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful labels on jars
customer_reviews.text: Update: This stuff is Amazing! This is my 2nd purchase! I decided I wanted to have a slice of toast for breakfast this morning and I used Ghee Butter instead of regular butter and it is amazing!!! (First purchase comment) Beautiful jars I purchased 2 after reading the great reviews. I did not like how it was packaged it was package with my personal blender and it needed to be wrapped around plastic I had no idea that the butter jar were glass jars they were together all three in a single package and it could’ve broken so in the future please focus on wrapping the jars.
customer_reviews.author: Rozzy

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like Home!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several brands of ghee over the years, and this one is the best! It tastes exactly like the ghee that my grandmother used to make in India. It's light, smooth and flavorful. I also like that this is lactose-free. A lot of the ghee brands in the Indian stores have added milk-fat!
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: 4 months out of date! Taste bad!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this brand for years, though this is the first time that I’ve received one that’s out of date. I opened it anyway. It didn’t smell good, (like it should), it smelled like rancid oil. And yes, I did tasted it, and it tasted like rancid oil too. It also had an odd white like coating around the inside of the jar. This has always been a good brand, so I can only think that this jar may have been stored in a very warm place and became rancid over time, besides being out of date.
customer_reviews.author: Kat  Palio

customer_reviews.title: Great Company! Excellent Products!
customer_reviews.text: My highly anticipated jar of 4th & Heart's Himalayan Pink Salt Grass-Fed Ghee Butter arrived yesterday afternoon. With just one little taste of it on the edge of a plastic knife, I knew my culinary life was going to be pleasantly changed henceforth. I'm now on a two-fold quest: 1) to discover/invent ways I can use this incredible grass-fed ghee in my food, beverages and possibly even for additional uses (i.e., cosmetically, medicinally, etc.); 2) to try other products by 4th & Heart; case in point: arriving in a few days is its Chocti Chocolate Coffee Ghee ... I only wish I'd discovered this wonderful company and its top-shelf products many years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I’ve used this twice and love the product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this twice and love the product. However, there seems to be an air bubble so it’s really only 1/2 of a jar. I’m hoping the seller will send me another one. So I’ll give a 3 and see what happens. Thank you in advance. No answer to my request.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee you can buy online!
customer_reviews.text: I love Ghee due to its taste and nutritional significance. Ayurveda has been recommending Ghee as essential part of diet but it went out of use after flawed research published in 70’s recommending use of vegetable fat over Ghee as it was thought to better for heart and atherosclerosis. We now after full circle in research Ghee back on healthy fat list This Ghee taste amazing and possibly due to its organic nature. Add amazing Flavour to cooked food and increase satiety and eventually encourage health eating with smaller portions Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Juss B

customer_reviews.title: Not Organic! Don't be fooled by product placement
customer_reviews.text: This item comes up every time I search for Organic ghee. I accidentally purchased it last month after searching for organic ghee. When it arrived, I realized it is not organic. Since then, I have shopped using the same "organic ghee" search terms multiple times, and every. single. time that I do, this product is at the top of the list. Amazon must have a promotional relationship with this brand for it to pop up so often when it does not even meet my search terms. Don't be fooled because this item shows at the top of your search, it is NOT organic!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kaput

customer_reviews.title: it was grainy with a funny smell. Had to throw away
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed—instead of smooth and creamy, as it normally is, it was grainy with a funny smell. Had to throw away. Won’t buy again on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: THF

customer_reviews.title: Afraid to try it
customer_reviews.text: Jar arrived in a box with a pillow but the metal lid was damaged inside the bubble bag it was packaged in. The shipping box was not damaged. The lid was dented in two places and the pop-up button on the top of the lid did not pop as the lid was actually loose upon arrival. It actually looked like it had not been screwed on properly before the seal tab was applied. Due to this not being sealed properly, I am afraid to even try this product. I have requested a replacement. Hopefully, when that arrives, it will be in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: rick sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Whew what's that smell?
customer_reviews.text: Taste like rancid butter. Label says not to refrigerate, so I didn't. Couldn't eat it on toast tonight. Maybe it will be better to cook with, maybe the smell will cook out. oh well, now I know....I see others have purchased the vanilla bean butter, maybe that was my mistake. Can't imagine putting this stuff in my coffee
customer_reviews.author: chief

customer_reviews.title: Needs better 'Packaging and Content' checking
customer_reviews.text: The jar came in a box that was opened and held together with a rubber band. It didn't have the seal tampered with, so I decided to use it. I do have to say the taste of this brand of Ghee is very good. After using it awhile, about a quarter down from the surface of the jar, there was a huge air pocket. There was about a third of the ghee missing. I was very disappointed and felt a little ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: neg

customer_reviews.title: Great product,
customer_reviews.text: I typically use a different brand of ghee as well as make my own, but so many of the food bloggers I follow are using this so I thought I would give it a try. I found the taste to be great, not overpowering, and a little goes a long way. The consistency is softer than what I normally use, which I liked. However, the jars are smaller for the same price as the other brands. If this item was on sale, I would definitely buy it again, but I cook daily and it gets a little expensive over time.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely delicious ! I pan seared some scallops and salmon with this garlic ghee, and it gave them such awesome flavor. The taste is so clean in without after taste. Equally delicious on veggies..I purchased a different brand before and I didn’t like the after taste it left behind. I will definitely try other flavors in this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, delicious ghee
customer_reviews.text: I got the Himalayan salt flavored ghee. It is amazingly delicious. This stuff has a strong buttery, caramel taste that is so good in so many things. It works really well in my cast iron skillet. Before this I tried Purity Farms Ghee because that is the only brand our local store carried. The Purity Farms ghee was so disgusting that I thought all ghee must be kind of gross. Nope. Taste must be related to quality. I love this stuff and will definitely be ordering more and trying some of the other flavors they offer. Vanilla bean is definitely on my "want to try it" list.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Inedible
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, there was a layer of mold covering the inside of the cap and the ghee. There was no expiration date. We are practicing blind trust when we order from these mystery sellers.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Yar only 2/3 full
customer_reviews.text: The taste is good but I got the jar and in the middle was a whole larger than a golf ball as a result the jar was only 2/3s full.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriele Incorvaia

customer_reviews.title: IT GAVE ME DIARRHEA, AND HAS TO MUCH SALT,
customer_reviews.text: IT GAVE ME DIARRHEA, AND HAS TO MUCH SALT, I HAVE WANTED TO TASTE THIS TYPE OF BUTTER, AND NOW, DO NOT KNOW WHAT TO DO WITH IT? RECEIVED IT TO DAY, SORRY I TRIED THIS, CAN I REFUND IT, IT IS TOO MUCH FOR A 85 YR PERSON... SORRY
customer_reviews.author: John Jones

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as a liquid instead of a solid!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I purchased this butter and my husband and I love it! Unfornately the last jar arrived & the plastic wrapped around it (luckily) caught the liquid that was already seeping out! Turned out the entire Jar was liquid instead of a butter state! It appears I have passed my return date but due to a death in the family butter was not a high priority ! I just wanted you to know what happened & no it did not sit outside all day! I am sure we will try again as we did enjoy this butter!! Thanks for listening!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy marti

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: I cannot eat dairy, due to lactose intolerance, but I can have Ghee instead. I actually prefer it to butter. And this brand is my absolute favorite. I have tried many other brands, and none can compare. It's really delicious on breads/toast, potatoes etc. And it has a very high smoke point so you can cook anything in it. A little bit of heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Judith S.

customer_reviews.title: The taste and quality.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the flavor. I've purchased this item twice. Both times the jar did not fill properly when it was put in the jar. There was a hole about the size of a nickel from the top of the jar to the bottom. Even though the taste of the Ghee was ok I don't think I will purchase this brand again. I want a full jar. Thats what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and Authentic!
customer_reviews.text: This is the ghee of the gods! Just note that if you live in a colder place the ghee with solidify. If you are following a recipe that involves the use of ghee, the recipe is most likely talking about ghee measurements in its liquid form. Melt the ghee down by placing it in a bowl of warm water before measuring!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Da Lima Leitao

customer_reviews.title: Surpasses traditional butter, by far!
customer_reviews.text: Second purchase. Don't want to be without it. Elderly and on a fixed income, but; if I don't deserve to treat myself, now...when do I? I no longer bake. Only use it to flavor what I am about to eat, such as some soups...yes, soups, toast, eggs....any meals in cans, heated..... etc. Enhances anything, with pure rich buttery goodness, like none other.
customer_reviews.author: rostead

customer_reviews.title: not properly clarified, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The second I started melting this ghee I could see a large quantity of dairy solids still in the product, which immediately started burning in my pan. The whole point of paying exorbitant prices for commercial ghee rather than clarifying it myself is to try to have all the milk solids removed. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Cook

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased other brands of Ghee with Himalayan salt from Trader Joe's, Sprouts, and Whole Foods. This is our favorite. We are now using this so regularly, that we increased our Subscribe and Save to a larger size jar. We are fearful we will run out. We put this in our coffee every morning. To us, putting this in coffee is a requirement like some put cream in their coffee. We highly recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wayman

customer_reviews.title: Two jars just right.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit miffed at having to purchase no fewer than two jars but am glad now that I did. This ghee is very lightly salted which means less salt needed while preparing food it will go on. I use this ghee as I would any other but use it a bit more than I did unsalted since it melts better. In fact I find I'm about ready to order again and this is much sooner than with my previous brand. In a word: RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: The Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Jar is not full!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ghee however I'm very disappointed because after using the top layer of ghee, the center of the jar is empty. At least 1/4 or more of the jar is hollow space. I couldn't tell this upon arrival because of the label covering the center of the jar. So beware and dig down in the jar when you get it to make sure that some of your order isn't missing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: Love this ghee. I keep my house a comfortable 70 degrees. I purchased the regular and garlic ghee and left it sealed tight non refrigerated. It’s been one month and the regular ghee was perfect, but the garlic needs to be thrown out having several black mold spots. I suggest possibly refrigerating it contrary to the instructions or I received a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: J. Winter

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest ghee on the market
customer_reviews.text: I love ghee butter, and 4th & Hart is the best ghee I have tasted anywhere (including traditional Indian brands). Some brands taste waxy, others are just plain funky. 4th & Hart ghee tastes like high-quality butter with no off flavors or weird aftertaste. It's great for all types of cooking and can go to higher temperatures than regular butter. It's also made from milk from grass-fed cows, and many dieticians say that's a healthier choice. I put it on pancakes, baked potatoes, steamed broccoli and I use it to pan fry my grass-fed steaks! I also put it in my bulletproof coffee. Bottom line: Buy it - it's delicious!
customer_reviews.author: JPM

customer_reviews.title: Great Covid times butter alternative
customer_reviews.text: Ghee is nothing more than clarified butter. It’s shelf stable but with summer coming it’s still best to keep in the fridge after opening. In our area, butter and many dairy product are next to impossible to obtain and we are so glad to have this fresh and tasty Ghee. If you are not yet familiar with it, use just like butter in the same proportion. It’s perfect for cooking yet is not as easy to use for spreading.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Like Wax
customer_reviews.text: Very waxy flavored. I was expecting it to more liquid than solid. Does not taste anything like true clarified butter. Trader Joe's brand is sooo much better in taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t melt into liquid butter
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the consistency of this butter. I had tried all types of ghee and if i don’t keep them in the fridge all of them melt.. for some reason this one doesn’t, it just becomes really really soft but it doesn’t turn into liquid oil. So I’m not sure whether or not this is a good sign. Maybe I’m wrong but I just don’t feel like buying it again
customer_reviews.author: Nora

customer_reviews.title: Yuck!! Nasty!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is so rancid tasting even my aunt that knows what Ghee butter smells & taste like said that this is BAD & isn't even expired if I knew that was bad I would have sent it back! But I didn't know I thought that was how it was to smell & taste. I will NOT be buying this again!!
customer_reviews.author: Alesha Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is the best garlic ghee ever! If you are trying to be healthier or just really love the flavor of ghee, and want to make anything with garlic - this is your answer. I've used on toast, veggies, meat, it's so good. Just a little bit goes a long way. I love putting a tiny bit on bread or buns & toast before making a sandwich or burger - it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie D

customer_reviews.title: Rancid
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to like this, but the smell as soon as I open the jar hits me right in the face. The taste, even a 1/4 of a teaspoon, overwhelms my whole shake. I think this product went bad sometime while sitting in Amazon. It's vile. I can't even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know if this product is any good because the "Pop seal" was broken
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if this product is any good because the "Pop seal" was broken, and there was no safety seal. We ordered 3 different ones of these, and 2 of the 3 had no seal around the top, and the "pop" seal (This is on the top of the cap that when you open a brand new jar will POP) indicated that the product had already been open.
customer_reviews.author: Sean A.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell and lingering nasty taste
customer_reviews.text: I used to love this product. The last 4 bottles leave a smell and taste that is nasty and hard to get rid off. I used it in my keto coffee, all day I smelled like rotten goats milk, stayed on my hands, tongue and nostrils! I thought, it could not be the GHEE, then I used in a vegetable dish... my company all said “did you use goat butter”? I had to through out the dish, I had to wash every dish it touched 3 times to get rid of the smell. Lingered in my taste buds for many hours. What the heck are you using to make the GHEE now? It is not grass feed cows milk!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anawake

customer_reviews.title: Worth it and will rebuy and tell others
customer_reviews.text: THIS!!!! I used this to saute veggies in. It was perfect flavor of garlic( not to over whelming) and it did a amazing job cooking the veg. My only thing woukd been to not cook from frozen cuz it made to much liquid i had to brain off, but that was my mistake. This product is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Stac

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have always heard of Ghee but never knew exactly what people were talking about until I started the Keto diet. I love butter and tend to use it often especialy when cooking eggs despite being lactose intolerant. When I use a lot of butter, I can definitely feel it. Now that I have ghee, I absolutely love it. I don't have to put it in the fridge, it stays soft, and I don't have any bad side effects like I used to with regular butter. I like this one in particular because it is grass fed and it has himalayan salt.
customer_reviews.author: Judy J.

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this ghee for about five years. I love it. This is a great quality. I love the taste and consistency. I have a few favorite flavors that I use regularly. Garlic for my veggies, vanilla for my sweet potatoes and fruit, him. Salt for baking. Love love love.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. It is my 1st time purchasing. I am reading a book called The Prime by Kulreet Chaudhary MD. You take a quiz.I am a Vata (ayurvedic dosha or body type). Ghee is one of the recommended foods for Vatas. I also believe in the blood type diet Eat Right 4 your type & ghee is also recommended for blood type O. The flavor is very fresh. I am usually a kerry gold irish butter fan. Since ghee is clarified butter the milk solids are removed. It seems like a very clean tasting product. I am also happy the cow's like kerry gold are grass fed & raised naturally in the pasture.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Broken bottle cut my finger while unpacking
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived broken . The glass bottle was broken and it did cut my finger while unpacking it. Be careful since if u don’t carefully open you can die. Also amazon doesn’t allow to replace or get refund on this product.
customer_reviews.author: online shoper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste. Good on toast or in matcha
customer_reviews.text: This stuff tastes so good. I’m lactose intolerant and so far, no side effects, so they’re doing a good job at clarifying the butter. I’ve put the ghee on toast and today, I even put it in my morning matcha latte. Amazing. I have the Himalayan pink salt and it has a slightly sweet taste with bits of crunchy sea salt. I’m going to have this in my pantry for life. Update: This stuff is so outrageously delicious, I've almost gone through the entire jar in two weeks using it exclusively in my matcha latte. I'm ordering the vanilla flavor next to really enhance my matcha latte.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn’t seal, ghee smells off.
customer_reviews.text: The ghee smells off. The lid on the jar won’t seal, won’t tighten. This is the second jar I’ve purchased that won’t seal, tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Past Expiration Date and Rancid
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this ghee in the past, even had it on my Subscribe & Save list, but I have just received a jar that is past its expiration date by four months. I ruined my morning cup of bulletproof coffee by putting a spoonful in it. I will return this if Amazon will take it back and I won’t be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Judelyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Ketogenetic diet.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried different butters but I’ve definitely had this one been ranked one of my top favorites. It has great flavors, but i usually just stick with the regular with pink Himalayan salt, and best of all it’s a healthy grass fed butter. I add it to my bulletproof coffee or to my paleo/low carb bread in the morning and it tastes amazing. I’ve used it for cooking too and all the flavor combos give you the ability to pick and choose what flavor fits your recipe the best. (Vanilla bean is a nice addition to bulletproof coffee as well).
customer_reviews.author: GetFit NoExcuses

customer_reviews.title: A veritable dessert food
customer_reviews.text: If you're on any type of high fat, zero carb, carnivore, keto, paleo lifestyle -- this is truly a sacred dessert food. The Himalayan salt makes the already delicious buttery flavor pop in a salted caramel kinda way. Maybe it's gross, but I basically lick it off the spoon / my fingers. Helps you get healthy fats & minerals, plus the electrolyte influx of good quality salt. Excellent all-around. Caveat: Would like them to offer 100% grass fed AND finished certification. But it doesn't seem like any ghee brands do.
customer_reviews.author: Garett Press

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful texture and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I love salted butter, and while I always have some on hand, I use ghee more often, especially when cooking as it has a higher smoke point than butter. This ghee is really nice, and the whipped texture makes it easier to scoop out of the jar and get in to a pan, or on a GF cracker, or scone or piece of bread. Great product, highly recommend, and while it is not as dense as un-whipped ghee, it is still a good value, especially when you subscribe and save!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Delicious with consistent quality
customer_reviews.text: We have tried the himalayan pink salt flavor and original flavor and both have been absolutely delicious. I love to put a spoonful in a skillet in the morning and make scrambled eggs with a bit of chorizo added. Magnificent! The original flavor is excellent if you are into bulletproof coffee. I would like to try the garlic flavor to melt over steaks. Sounds spectacular! Anyway, consistent high quality from this product. Great taste. Easy to order. My only issue is that a jar doesn't last long enough in our household bc we eat it too quickly!
customer_reviews.author: KBCTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Now that it actually has arrived...love it! Didn’t come in the package it was supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: The package just arrived today February 21st, but had said it had arrived with a package with five other items, and yet it was not in with them. I’m not sure who pack these boxes but they really need to double check that all items have been actually shipped. Now that it has arrived, I’m thrilled with the product itself, could cost a little less considering it’s just clarified butter, but I guess that’s what we pay for in savings of time.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs E

customer_reviews.title: Best Ghee Out there
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best ghee I've ever bought. Sometimes you get ghee that is overly processed, which makes it smell a bit off and makes it a bit greasy. This ghee is better than any I've found or tried. It's perfect for everything from Asian food to popcorn. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Sadly not spreadable
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived as a liquid, and leaking from package as I noted another reviewer had mentioned was their experience. It's a very pricey jar of liquid. I cleaned up the outside of the jar and put what was left into the refrigerator to turn the liquid into a solid, but now it's a very hard chunky solid mass that is not at all spreadable, but rather like chipping pieces and shredding it like frozen butter. I guess I had unrealistic expectations from the product description... I had envisioned a spreadable, smooth ghee that would be a lovely butter replacement. This is not at all my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara McCleary

customer_reviews.title: Updated!!! So far so great! Just got this product and the shipping was ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so great! Just got this product and the shipping was great as wel has how it looks being delivered. Will give further review once tried Finally tried this on food. Sooo yummy. A little goes a long way for sure! Don’t use too much on your food. Remember not to refrigerate also. Let’s go whole30 fam!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Super yummy
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so yummy. If you are lactose intolerant this is a great way to have your butter and eat it too. Not sure if you have a true dairy allergy if this is safe. My daughter and I are just intolerant of lactose and this is so delicious and doesn’t give us tummy aches. Everyone is different so use with caution if you have an issue. My husband has Crohns’s and has many food issues. This Ghee is super pure and he can digest it without issue. The flavor is so yummy for anyone who doesn’t have a problem with dairy or lactose too.
customer_reviews.author: jhopmusic

customer_reviews.title: Great ghee butter the best I have had!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand and have bought it in both vanilla flavor and regular flavor. It comes well packaged and sealed and you get a good amount for the money. It is very good ghee butter.
customer_reviews.author: pjo48

customer_reviews.title: It is ok, however it did allow me to fly.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and it was the first Ghee I had ever tried. I wasn't overly impressed with it until... some of my friends who had tried Ghee before came by to try it. They sampled a bit of it and agreed it was pretty common in their experience of Ghee. This had me a little disappointed, but then I noticed my cat had eaten some of it and she was... sitting quietly on the floor. She did not try to get at the Ghee after that, so I guess she wasn't overly impressed. Additionally, I can fly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Marcus Allen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I thought I didn't like ghee until a friend gave me a sample of this. Very fresh smelling and tasting unlike what I was using previously. Excellent substitute for vegetable oils when you need to cook something for awhile and don't want regular dairy butter because it might burn or get too dark. Great flavor
customer_reviews.author: Gr8pnut

customer_reviews.title: ... up to use for my family dinner and was disappointed to find that it was only 2/3 full
customer_reviews.text: I opened this up to use for my family dinner and was disappointed to find that it was only 2/3 full. For the high price I would expect a full container. The taste is good and it worked well for cooking. Judging by the picture it looks full to the top. Not the case in my product. I would appreciate a replacement to see if this remains the case.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: First time GHEE eater here
customer_reviews.text: I've started a keto journey which includes eating Ghee butter. To be completely honest, I've never heard of it before. After reading reviews I ordered and was pleasantly surprised at how it tastes. Really good! I've so far cooked eggs in it and spread it on a high protein pancake. Tastes great~
customer_reviews.author: D. Foss

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Mine tastes old. There's a strange after taste. I did just receive it, I'll cook a small portion with some veggies, and rereview it. The price is nice, I got it quickly, and only one tape seal on it, it didn't "pop" when I opened it. Making me think why it doesn't taste "fresh". We'll see after I cook with it. If it's still weird tasting, I'm sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Don't understand all the hype.
customer_reviews.text: If you're after garlic butter taste, there are WAY better options out there. The garlic butter taste in this was almost nonexistent. It was like adding spoonfuls of "nothing" to your food. I was so excited to try this after hearing about how awesome it is to cook with. I am not impressed and have had way better garlic butter's out there.
customer_reviews.author: Verified purchase

customer_reviews.title: Nice Flavor
customer_reviews.text: I added this product to my diet to help remineralize teeth. Since I wasn't sure if this comes from spring-grass-fed cows, I'm not sure how effective it is for that purpose. I use Himalayan salt in my diet, anyway, so it made sense to buy a ghee that uses it for flavoring. It's pricey for a bread spread. I'm not sure if it works to remineralize teeth. The jury is still out on that one. Since this is the first ghee I've used, I'm not sure how it compares to similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Roseanne Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: Yummy & Super Flavorful
customer_reviews.text: Decided to see what all the hype was about ghee and I wasn't disappointed. I purchased this and the vanilla bean ghee and they're both delicious. I want to eat them with a spoon.
customer_reviews.author: sapphiredragonn

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is a secrete ingredient...
customer_reviews.text: WOW, this stuff is GOOD. Give it try on your toast. I got this to make one dish and after that I started to use it on/in everything. I almost did not want to write because I wanted to keep this to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Lee Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: YUM!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This stuff is great. The smell alone is just amazing. I use this for everything I'd use regular butter for, but my favorite thing I put it in is my bulletproof coffee. I was making the coffee with another brand of ghee when I started the whole bulletproof coffee thing, and since that ran out and I started using this, the difference is kind of unbelievable. It's less greasy at the top of my coffee and more frothy. I can't believe the difference a brand can make. LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.author: C&C Yeazel

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Last Night, Buying More This Morning!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived last night. I put some on brioche and toasted it for my boyfriend to go with dinner. He took one bite and looked at me and said very seriously "I am never eating regular butter ever again". I was like wooow that was a strong reaction. He has had other ghees in the past and never seemed that interested. This is very smooth and not at all chunky or cheesy like others can be. We are very pleased with this purchase and I am back this morning to buy other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: received product defective on delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received this product defective but was not "eligible for return." So I will remove it from my subscribe and save and buy it in the stores. The product is good BUT it does not travel well.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria B

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad, won't buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a second time, smelled it and was awful. Rancid, and with a plastic smell. I expected much more for a clarified butter. It would be better to clarify the butter yourself from good butter.
customer_reviews.author: Music 4 U

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is the smoothest, creamiest, best-tasting ghee I've ever used. Love the Himalayan salt - perfectly salty to add flavor to whatever you spread it on. The vanilla flavor tastes like frosting!! I feel good about feeding it to my kids. I will only be buying this brand from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Ghee What A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use it on almost everything I eat. It not even salty if you cook with it. But on toast you can really taste the salt. It still is amazing and the taste is really good. I have subscription for this product now. Ps the small container might last a little over a week. If you eat toast with it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I get this with the Himalayan sea salt added. So easy to spread. Soft solid at room temperature but turns into better oil when heated. Milk solids removed so it stores at room temperature. Tastes great!
customer_reviews.author: P. St Germain

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what to say other than this was horrible. The one I received wasn't fresh by any means. It smells and tastes REALY bad. This is the last time I ever purchase this item. I ignored the negative posts in hope that it was a fluke. It wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Fresh, tasty garlic ghee
customer_reviews.text: Fine, fresh ghee with just the right amount of garlic. We use it to cook eggs, add to veggies, spread on toast, and added to pasta/sauce. When we want a hint, but not too much garlic, this works perfectly. I also like its long shelf life; we keep it in the cupboard.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: Great ghee but cheaper alternatives exist.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad at all however for the price there are similar alternatives for less. I use a fair amount of ghee so I wanted to see if this was any better than a few other brands of grass fed ghee ive used in the past. It wasn’t. Not saying it’s not good, it’s great but the taste doesn’t justify the price, in my own opinion. It is a quality product as far I can tell but not practical for my household.
customer_reviews.author: Simon S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Buttery
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time tasting ghee, and I am pleasantly surprised! Less smooth in texture than normal butter, but very flavorful, and melts well. I've tried it on toast and baked potatoes and liked both. If you don't like salty things, this might be a bit much for you, but I really liked it and will order again.
customer_reviews.author: Sexyballerina02

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, just doesn't spread the way I expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm on the fence with this review as this is my first experience with ghee, nottto compare it to besides butter. If you expect the same consistency as softened butter as I did you'll be disappointed. Mine was more like the consistency of apple butter. The taste reminded me of clarified butter that you'd dip lobster into. It was pretty salty and would be great over popcorn. Might be too salty for some other uses. If cooking with it I'd avoid added additional salt.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Bunting

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating paleo for several years and when I first started using ghee it was only for recipes and I was not a fan of the taste and my husband hated it. The Himalayan Pink Salt ghee is amazing! I could eat this ghee straight from the jar, I use it for everything, I even put it in my coffee. Everytime I use it to saute or bake veggies or put on toast or grilled cheese my husband and my kids tell me how amazing it is! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Beware!! Too Salty!
customer_reviews.text: Way, way, way, way too much salt!! I had to get a refund. BTW I am not on a low salt diet but this was just too much! I tried to contact company directly, could not reach live person.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: We have ordered this two times. One time it came in glass jar and the other in plastic. I prefer glass at home but plastic at camp. I think the jars material is based on size so if you have a preference then ask as i do not think it is listed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: PipeFighter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing ghee ever! I am following and AIP diet after being diagnosed with sibo and hashmitos. I have tried several different brands of ghee ,never could get accustomed to the tatse. After this I will never use another brand!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thedrakes

customer_reviews.title: Check the glass for cracks
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these (one as a present for a friend). I gave it to her and she told me the next day that the bottom was cracked. Well it was pretty bad to. She had to throw the whole jar away. The odd part was that I left it in the bubble wrap when I gave it to her so I didn’t notice anything wrong. I used mine and it was awesome! Totally changed my grilled cheese experience!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: Just got my order. Delicious! Until I realized it expires in a few days. I guess they expect you the eat the whole jar in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I usually have had a great experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: I usually have had a great experience with this product; this delivery there was an air pocket and when pressed down the contents of the jar was only 1/2 full; this product is very, very expensive to not receive the desired quantity. Also, unlike previous orders, this jar contained a pink hue inside the lid and around the top section of the jar. I don't know if that is the pink salt affect or its a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used to be a great product. Not anymore.
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a great product but recently all the ghee (salted and unsalted) from them has been separated and grainy. A few months ago they moved from glass to plastic containers for their large container, I suspect to cut costs. At that time they also appear to of made other changes in all their product because multiple order have been separated and grainy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Neely

customer_reviews.title: Love ghee!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand thus far and I have tried several. This one is always spreadable and smooth not runny or just oily tasting. Brown buttery deliciousness. Update: 06/2020 Still buying and still satisfied. A bit in coffee nearly every morning to start my day. Summer months it's very hot shipping to my area. Not a problem if those jars are sealed completely and not bouncing around in box with all the other Subscription items. 😓💦
customer_reviews.author: GDAU

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Ghee
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smell when I opened it. I don't have that much experience with ghee, but what I have had, I have always really liked. This product, however, smells and tastes better than any other I have had. I am really pleased with this purchase, and would recommend this product. Also, it seems much more reasonably priced than most of the other small batch, grass fed ghee available on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with my Keto morning coffee with a tsp of the vanilla bean ghee! It adds a slight vanilla flavor to my coffee, mct powder, and unsweetened almond milk. I feel like I am drinking a latte. I mix and froth is all together with a milk frother. This vanilla bean ghee butter has made my mornings more delicious!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Overly salty, salt poorly distributed, just don't like the taste, poor value
customer_reviews.text: Taste is... well, a matter of taste. So I didn't rank it lower - you may love it! That being said, I can barely stand to finish it. I'm hoping mixing it 50/50 with coconut oil will cut the excessive saltiness and objectionable (to me) flavor. In one jar, a big lump of salt was in the bottom. I far prefer Purity Farms ghee, even though that may not be organic.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking many foods!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Ghee purchase and this stuff rocks! I seriously made one of the best tasting salmon dishes ever using this stuff while pan-searing. Taste great, cooks great. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mdz1971

customer_reviews.title: Jar of Ghee Butter leaked in box, upon opening.
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box of 3 Ghee butter products, one was laying on its side with melted butter all over the bottom of the box. I washed it off and put it on the shelf in my pantry. The next day there was melted butter on the shelf. I opened it up and butter was at the top of jar, so I don't know why there was so much melted butter under the jar, but it was also all over the sides. I will not eat any butter from that jar as I'm not sure what the problem was.
customer_reviews.author: beauty buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fast expiration
customer_reviews.text: I realize that ghee does not have an extremely long shelf life, but I was very disappointed to see that the package I receive this week expires just 3 months from now. I have purchased ghee from my local Trader Joe's that had a much longer expiration date. Not sure if this was sitting on someone's shelf for awhile or what but I'm not happy that at this cost, I can get 3 months from the product. Deducted a couple of stars for that. As for the taste, I am happy with it and quality seems good.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan B.

customer_reviews.title: Broken!
customer_reviews.text: The box is in perfect condition but the jar is all busted up!! There are shards of glass in the product so I have to trash the entire thing. Not happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy leake

customer_reviews.title: Great for cooking
customer_reviews.text: This ghee is super great to sear and cook with, and I love that you can use it at high temperatures (compared to olive oil). I will sometimes just make eggs with it as well. The garlic flavor is a nice addition. I hadn't ever actually purchased ghee but I would say that the high price is worth is because it lasts a while and a little goes a long way. It's also nice to buy products that you know come from a pasture-raised humane source. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Teagan Knight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this ghee butter. It’s a great quality brand and much cheaper on amazon than at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I love the 4th & Heart ghee
customer_reviews.text: I love the 4th & Heart ghee. Let me start by saying that. However, the garlic flavor just isn't for me. Something is just a bit off with the flavor. I don't doubt that it's all natural but it almost tastes artificial. It's also very overpowering - and I generally love the taste of garlic. Four stars because it's a fantastic quality product from a great brand, but I just don't enjoy the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Barker

product_meta.title: Himalayan Pink Salt Grass-Fed Ghee Butter by 4th & Heart, 9 Ounce, Keto, Pasture Raised, Non-GMO, Lactose Free, Certified Paleo
product_meta.description:
Size:9 Ounce (Pack of 1)Fourth and Heart's grass-fed ghee is very lightly salted and gently whipped to add flavor to just about anything. Ghee is a type of clarified butter that is heated, reduced & triple-filtered out and what you’re left with is the pure healthy fat, which is lactose free & dairy free, good for digestion and metabolism. It is an iconic ingredient and food staple with a history as rich as its taste. It originates in India and is used extensively in cooking and to promote health. Ghee alone is an excellent alternative to butter for those who are lactose intolerant and who want the taste of butter, without the disadvantages of processed margarines. Unlike other oils it is rich in butyric acid, a short chain fatty acid that is great for your overall health and digestion. Ghee’s buttery taste and high smoke point (485 degrees) makes it an excellent addition to your everyday cooking oils, is extremely easy to cook with and delicious simply spread on a piece of toast. Fourth & Heart grass-fed ghee uses the highest quality grass-fed butter sourced from a cooperative of farms in New Zealand. Grass is naturally high in Vitamin A, D, E, K and CLA. When the cow’s milk is rich with these vitamins it goes directly to the butter and therefor the ghee. Replace your everyday butter & oil with 100% Grass-Fed Pure Spreadable Butter. Please note: ghee naturally melts at approximately 90-degrees farenheit, which can occur during transit and delivery. This is perfectly normal and will not damage the ghee, which will resolidify if left at room temperature or refrigerated for 2-3 hours. Ghee itself is a type of clarified butter that is heated, reduced & triple-filtered out and what you’re left with is the pure healthy fat, which is lactose free & dairy free, good for digestion and metabolism. It is an iconic ingredient and food staple with a history as rich as its taste. It originates in India and is used extensively in cooking and to promote health. Ghee alone is an excellent alternative to butter for those who are lactose intolerant and who want the taste of butter, without the disadvantages of processed margarines. Unlike other oils it is rich in butyric acid, a short chain fatty acid that is great for your overall health and digestion. Ghee’s buttery taste and high smoke point (485 degrees) makes it an excellent addition to your everyday cooking oils, is extremely easy to cook with and delicious simply spread on a piece of toast. Fourth & Heart grass-fed ghee uses the highest quality grass-fed butter sourced from a cooperative of farms in New Zealand. Grass is naturally high in Vitamin A, D, E, K and CLA. When the cow’s milk is rich with these vitamins it goes directly to the butter and therefor the ghee. Replace your everyday butter & oil with Grass-Fed Pure Spreadable Butter. Please note: ghee naturally melts at approximately 90-degrees farenheit, which can occur during transit and delivery. This is perfectly normal and will not damage the ghee, which will resolidify if left at room temperature or refrigerated for 2-3 hours.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




Ghee for Every Occasion Revolutionizing ghee's culinary potential with a variety of flavor infusions derived from only the highest quality ingredients, including Himalayan Salt, Madagascar Vanilla Bean, California Garlic, and Turmeric. Perfect for sautéing, baking, coffee, smoothies, and anywhere you would use butter.

Unique, flawless texture Our ghee has a smooth, creamy texture that's spreadable like regular butter while maintaining all the nutritional benefits of traditional ghee. Keep it in your pantry or next to your stove - no need to refrigerate.




Grass Fed, Pure Ingredients Made from grass fed New Zealand butter, raised without antibiotics, pesticides, or herbicides like glyphosate. Raquel personally sourced each ingredient, selecting only the finest available.

High Smoke Point (485 degrees) Ghee is the perfect cooking oil and can be safely cooked with even at high temperatures while retaining its beneficial properties and infusing your dish with the delicious flavor of butter.

Pure Nutrition Certified Non-GMO (Certification by NSF issued 8/28/17) and Gluten Free (Certification 66286 issued 2/28/18). Made without dairy ingredients, and no pesticide, herbicide, or rBST. Compatible with Paleo, Whole30, Ketogenic, FODMAP, Ayurvedic friendly diets. High in Omega-3, CLA, and Butyric Acid.




Fuel Happy Fourth & Heart is an artisanal food brand based in Los Angeles. We're on a mission to modernize ancient pantry food staples starting with a line of grass-fed pure spreadable butters known as "ghee."




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Spreadable Butter Alternative

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

Raquel was originally inspired by her mother's love of Ayurveda and it was a staple in her home while growing up. She made her first batch of flavored ghee while experimenting in the kitchen in 2006.

What makes your product special?

4th & Heart ghee is made only from the purest ingredients, and has a creamy, spreadable texture. Our unique flavor varieties also add culinary nuance and versatility to ghee's place in your kitchen.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

The incredible human beings we've met along our journey! The wisdom we've received from our customers, team, advisors, and the food community overall continually inspires us to Fuel Happy everyday.
feature_bullets: WE SOURCE THE BEST: Our lactose-free ghee comes from grass-fed, pasture-raised, antibiotic and hormone free New Zealand cows.
DELICATELY SEASONED: Light and creamy whipped texture with just the right amount of fine-ground, mineral rich Himalayan Salt Pink Salt.
USE ANYTIME: Our shelf-stable ghee is spreadable at room temperature. No refrigeration required
NO SHORTCUTS: Our ghee is cooked the old-fashioned way, not made with a centrifuge.
UPGRADE ANY RECIPE: Replace your current butter, olive oil, coconut oil or other cooking oil 1:1 with ghee.
DIET FRIENDLY: Great addition to any diet – Certified Keto, Paleo, Gluten Free, Ayurvedic, Whole 30, and FODMAP friendly.
HELPFUL NOTE: Ghee may liquefy during shipping, but will re-solidify within a few hours of refrigeration, or overnight at room temperature.
